name: Clinical_Order_Workflow_MHEvent_Codes
title: Clinical_Order_Workflow_MessageHeaderEvent_Codes

contact.name: HL7 International - Orders and Observations Work Group

description: The Event codes for the MessageHeader.event element needed for the order workflow

concept.display: The message is about a new order being placed
concept.definition: This code is to be used when a new order is communicated for fulfillment for the first time. Any subsequent messages about this order will use the order-update code.

concept.display: The message is an update to an existing order
concept.definition: The state of the order fulfillment is tracked via the Task resource. This value indicates that this message is an update (including completion) for an already existing order.
